text: Bay11-7082 inhibits pro-IL-1beta production in response to P . aeruginosa .

PMA-differentiated THP-1 cells were treated with 10 microM CFTRinh172 or 20 microM Bay11-7082 and harvested after ( A ) 4 hours ( n = 3 ) or ( B ) 0.5 , 1 , and 1.5 hours ( n = 3 ) stimulation with PAO1 .
One representative blot is shown with a graph of the averaged fluorescence intensity values over 3 experiments .
